divs: sighting detailsin fort worth, near i-30 and 820, looking toward the west at the sky, above a 5 or 6 story building, i saw what looked similar to a falling star. but, it was so much larger than a falling star. it was as close to earth as a plane would be. it only lasted for a couple of seconds. i just sat there staring at the sky, not believing what i saw. my friend asked me what i was looking at. i just looked at her with a strange look on my face. i was afraid to tell her. finally, i told her that i saw a large light flying through the sky. she said it was probably a ufo, that a lot of people had been seeing them lately. if i had to say exactly what it was, i would say an object on fire flying through the sky. for a second i thought it might be a meteor. it was very bright, some blue, white and orange colored lights\fire. i wasn't able to see it long, due to the height of the insurance bldg to the west of us. i wish i had. it's definitely got my curiousity.
trends: There have been 128 other sightings in Fort Worth
There were no other sightings in Fort Worth on or around October 30th 2008
